sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT sindra.* , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NUM) AS RNUM , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NUM DESC) AS RNUM2 , (SELECT YSM_MCLASS_NM FROM YSM_M_CLASS WHERE YSM_HCLASS_CD = 'G1' AND ODR = sindra.G1_GB) AS validation , (SELECT YSM_MCLASS_NM FROM YSM_M_CLASS WHERE YSM_HCLASS_CD = 'G2' AND ODR = sindra.G2_GB) AS instruction , (SELECT YSM_MCLASS_NM FROM YSM_M_CLASS WHERE YSM_HCLASS_CD = 'G3' AND ODR = sindra.G3_GB) AS scaling FROM SINDRA AS sindra WHERE 1=1
sindra.DB_INS_TM >= #schYsmStartDt#
sindra.DB_INS_TM <= #schYsmEndDt#
sindra.ADDR LIKE CONCAT('%' , #schText# , '%' )
sindra.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%' , #schText# , '%')
sindra.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%' , #schText# , '%')
) A
WHERE RNUM2 > #firstIndex# AND RNUM2 <= #lastIndex# ORDER BY RNUM DESC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SINDRA ( NUM , REG_ID , G1_GB , G2_GB , G3_GB , G4_GB , G5_GB , G6_GB , YSM_DT , STT_HOUR , STT_MIN , END_HOUR , END_MIN , DB_INS_TM , CONTENT , TITLE , GENDER , ADDR , WEEK_CD , NARCISSUS , YSM_NO , YSM_NM , YSM_ID ) VALUES ( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(hyu.NUM),0)+1 FROM SINDRA AS hyu) , #regId# , #g1Gb# , #g2Gb# , #g3Gb# , #g4Gb# , #g5Gb# , #g6Gb# , #ysmDt# , #SttHour# , #SttMin# , #EndHour# , #EndMin# , NOW() , #content# , #title# , #gender# , #addr# , #weekCd# , #narcissus# , #ysmNo# , #ysmNm# , #ysmId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SINDRA SET G1_GB = #g1Gb# , G2_GB = #g2Gb# , G3_GB = #g3Gb# , G4_GB = #g4Gb# , G5_GB = #g5Gb# , CONTENT = #content# WHERE NUM = #num#
